sources.note: Main website. Describes GeniusDoc as EHR designed by physicians for physicians, focused on hematology/oncology. Lists modules including MIPS, public health reporting, CCM/OCM, mobile app.
ONC mandatory disclosures page. Confirms GeniusDoc 12.0 is ambulatory practice management software, certified by SLI Compliance. Lists Surescripts and Best Sync as required dependencies.

Detailed chemotherapy module page. Describes regimen library, chemo ordering (BSA/AUC/ANC calculations), administration documentation, flowsheets, TNM staging, tumor marker graphing, treatment calendar with wave scheduling.

Rich clinical features page. Describes SOAP charts, physical exam designer, disease management, prescription module with interaction screening, CPOE, lab integration, document management, image capture, telephone triage, correspondence templates.

Billing module page. Describes integrated revenue cycle management, automated charge posting, claims generation, CPT/ICD coding, E&M code suggestions, EOB tracking, gastroenterology-specific code filtering.
EDI page describing Gateway EDI partnership. Electronic claims submission to 3,000+ payers, secondary claims processing, HIPAA compliance, EHNAC accreditation.

Meaningful Use page. Lists 43 ambulatory clinical quality measures, general criteria including drug interaction checks, problem/medication/allergy lists, vital signs, smoking status, lab results, immunization registry, public health surveillance, security features.

Technical requirements page. Windows Server/SQL Server architecture, specifications for 1-200 users, domain model required, remote access capabilities, Dragon voice recognition support, fax integration.
2016 press release about Updox partnership. Describes GeniusDoc as fully-integrated EHR and practice management for multiple specialties focusing on hematology/oncology. CEO Sunil Nemani quoted.

EMR Industry listing. Describes fully integrated EHR+PM+Patient Portal+RCM. Identifies B2B Software Technologies as developer (Mumbai Stock Exchange since 1998). Santa Monica CA primary operations. ONC-ATCB, Surescripts ERX Gold, Microsoft Gold certified. Ideal for smaller/midsize practices.

SoftwareSuggest listing with 2 verified reviews (4.5/5 rating). Lists 20+ features including patient management, EMR, billing, telehealth, e-prescribing. Some metadata may be inaccurate (lists B2B Software Technologies as developer in Hyderabad).

B2B Software Technologies page about GeniusDoc. Describes it as comprehensive practice management system with clinical documentation, ICD-10/CPT coding, scheduling, prescription management, security, and reporting. Browser-based access. Lists GeniusDoc as part of their healthcare suite.
CCM/OCM page — nearly empty, contained only the company name with no substantive content.
MedicalRecords.com listing — essentially empty, no substantive product information.
